module.name: bind
module.summary: Berkeley internet name domain DNS server.

interface.name: bind_domtrans_ndc
interface.summary: Execute ndc in the ndc domain.

interface.name: bind_run_ndc
interface.summary: Execute ndc in the ndc domain, and allow the specified role the ndc domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the bind domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the bind domain to use.

interface.name: bind_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute bind in the named domain.

interface.name: bind_manage_config_dirs
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete BIND configuration directories.

interface.name: bind_manage_cache
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete BIND cache files.

interface.name: bind_setattr_pid_dirs
interface.summary: Do not audit attempts to set the attributes of the BIND pid directory.

interface.name: bind_udp_chat_named
interface.summary: Send and receive datagrams to and from named. (Deprecated)

desc.p: Allow BIND to write the master zone files. Generally this is used for dynamic DNS.
